body: Hi PvP Team This Is Training Time We Would Like The PvP Team To Be At MCZone01 NOW Please. {Lets Roll Baby}
body_tagged: Hi PvP Team This Is Training Time We Would Like The PvP Team To Be At MCZone01 NOW Please. {Lets Roll Baby}
title: PvP Team Go To MCZone01

replies.body:
Please do not make spam topics, the forums are inteded to be used to start discussions that pertain to the community as a whole, also you posten this in the wrong category.

If you wish to arrange a training session with your Team, use Skype or something of the sort.

Locking
